spell1.name: COSMIC FLAMES
spell1.description: Launch a fiery projectile forward, applying 1 Spark on hit; critical hits apply 2 Sparks. At 3 Sparks, trigger an explosion that applies 1 Spark to nearby enemies and heals Phoenix over time.

attributes.label: DAMAGE FALLOFF
attributes.value: Falloff begins at 10m, decreasing to 60% at 30m

attributes.label: SELF HEALING AMOUNT AFTER THE EXPLOSION
SPECIAL EFFECT
attributes.value: Apply 1 Spark per hit (2 on crit). At 3 Sparks, trigger a fiery explosion; explosion also applies 1 Spark to nearby enemies.

spell2.name: ENDSONG INFERNO
spell2.description: Soar into the sky with the Phoenix and crash down, dealing devastating damage, destroying enemy Summons/Shields/Bonus Health, and applying 1 Spark to enemies hit.
spell2.changeDescription: Release baseline; 2025-07-24 bugfix: mid-air turning no longer affected by frame rate (no numeric change)

spell3.name: TELEPATHIC ILLUSION
spell3.description: Leave behind an illusion and instantly teleport in the desired direction; the illusion detonates after a short delay, applying 1 Spark to enemies hit.

attributes.label: SPECIAL EFFECT
attributes.value: The detonation applies 1 Spark to enemies hit.

spell4.name: DARK ASCENT
spell4.description: Merge with the Phoenix, entering free flight. Gain a Movement Boost and continuously replenish ammo.

attributes.label: SPECIAL EFFECT
attributes.value: Enter free flight; +50% Movement Boost; replenish 4 ammo per second.

spell5.name: TELEKINESIS BURST
spell5.description: Mark a targeted area with psionic energy, followed by three fiery explosions. The first Stuns; the next two inflict Slow. Applies 1 Spark per hit.

attributes.label: SPECIAL EFFECT
attributes.value: Each explosion applies 1 Spark; first explosion Stuns, subsequent two inflict Slow.

spell6.name: MIND'S GRACE (Team-Up)
spell6.description: With Wolverine: his Feral Leap becomes Phoenix Warrior (percentage damage, Lifesteal). Phoenix gains a 10% damage bonus as Anchor.
spell6.changeDescription: Team-Up introduced: Mind's Grace (Wolverine) 10% Anchor bonus.
